name: Rolling Home
description:
Description:

The Sleems make a return and need to roll back home.

Protect them from the lava by tilting the world.

Various obstacles will be in your way. Overcome them to survive.

...and beware the lava rolls too.

LDJam49:

The game was created in 72 hours as part of the 49th Ludum Dare - visit the entry page: here

Controls: A and Dtilt the worldArrow Left and Rightselect a SleemSpace or Upinteract with the selected Sleem

For one-handed play you can also use W and S to select Sleems

Enjoy!
